description: Dashboard that graphs metrics exported via Prometheus plugin in Kong (http://github.com/kong/kong)

panels.title: RPS per route/service by status code
Kong Proxy Latency across all services
Kong shared memory usage by Node ($instance)
Kong worker Lua VM usage by Node ($instance)

targets.expr:
sum(kong_upstream_target_health{state="healthy", upstream=~"$upstream"}) by (upstream, target, address) * -1
+ 
sum(kong_upstream_target_health{state=~"(unhealthy|dns_error)", upstream=~"$upstream"}) by (upstream, target, address) * 1

title: Kong (official)
